item.title: Build multi arch docker image using Tekton
item.description: There are three different strategies to build multi-platform images that are supported by Buildx and Dockerfiles: Using the QEMU emulation support in the kernel Building on multiple native nodes using the same builder instance Using a stage in Dockerfile to cross-compile to different architectures I’ll focus on the first option, cross building with emulation. docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 . Setup This differs from platform to platform but one thing we all have in common is pipelines, so I’ve constructed a basic buildx setup for TektonCD task.
